dialogues.text: Alright... We're good. Just don't keep us in the dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is only dark, my friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie studies this strange, sad man. Looks at him with something between fear and mistrust. Macy just looks tire and mad. Matt takes them both in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happens when you find him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Alejandro is already walking back to the warehouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's been a humdinger of a day. Go home. Get some rest. We'll find a ride. See you tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt turns and walks back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I just drove a hundred fucking miles...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a blessing, trust me. I want to stop and get some cigarettes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got you smoking again... it was that bad?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She moves to the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Worse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie watches Matt walk back in the warehouse, trying desperately to play catch up. Wondering why no one, his partner included, will tell him anything...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie drives down an empty interstate 19. Up ahead, he s a TRUCK STOP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not that I think you should, but if you want cigarettes --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks over -- she is sound asleep. He drives past the truck stop, tail lights fading into the desert...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy lays in bed watching the blades of her ceiling fan i their endless revolution. She rises -- dressed in pajamas last -- and heads to the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pours a cup of coffee, heads to her computer. Pulls u the CNN website, scrolls the news, nothing about a shoot- on the border.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goes to the El Paso newspaper website. Nothing there eith She googles SHOOT OUT, JUAREZ... is bombarded with images

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her screen is flooded with photos: women naked, tortured, beaten. Breasts cut off, pinkish flesh exposed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bodies of men in ditches, dead in chairs, dead in cars... dead everywhere. But nothing of yesterday. The images inv her. Can't look anymore...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She digs up a cigarette, goes to her screen door, opens i and steps out, lights her smoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sees Reggie pull up and park. She yells down to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're phone's off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta go. Those spooks been calling me all morning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Want some coffee?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to get dressed. Come up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie leans against the dining room table, cup of coffee hand. Macy moves from her bathroom, slacks on and only an old, off white bra. He notices. Doesn't hide it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotta get you a new bra, woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: List of things I need is almost infinite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just saying. You gotta... some nice lacy something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She walks in the room, buttoning the last of her shirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Been so long since anyone's seen me in a bra, except you... don't look at me like that. No pity, thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How was seeing Evan the other day?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miss him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guy works eighty hours a week and thinks I'm too focused on my job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmhmm. And what does that tell you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ask me something else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was it like? On the border.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns to him. How do you describe it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's broken ... The whole place. Just ... Lost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He absorbs that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wish you hadn't volunteered for this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me too. But... I have to know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Know what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could it get that bad here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you sure picked the mother fuckers to show us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie and Macy knock on the door. It opens. Matt, dresse for golf, stands there with a slurpee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They walk into the `suite', the best a motel room can be. walls are covered with TOPO MAPS of Arizona, ROAD MAPS, a GEOLOGICAL MAPS... Alejandro sits at a table with FOUR MIGRANTS from the warehouse. Worker bees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro points to a spot on the map with a chopstick fr their take out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't cross there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Points somewhere else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the coyotes there are crooked. No women can cross there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro looks at Matt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should watch here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro points to another spot, just across the border Sasabe, Mexico.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the migrants say `No!' In unison, even laughing at th notion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is drug land. The only people that cross there are forced to. To keep the Border patrol busy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You try to cross there, they will kill you. And for a woman... a rape tree for her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That is for their tunnels. Never cross where there is tunnels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know this land? A tunnel where cars can pass?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh yeah. For years, the best place to cross... right here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points to a depression on the TOPO MAP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This arroyo? You can walk it all the way to highway 86. There is shade and a spring -- here. But a tunnel is there now. Don't go there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie's jaw is on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you getting this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. I don't believe it, but I understand what they're saying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you mark the tunnel on here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hands him a pen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure. It's been a while. Three years. They made me dig for a month to cross. I snuck out one night and ran... They hide the entrance behind an old car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guillermo was telling the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro looks at Matt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is our way across. Right here.(Back to the migrants) Where do you live?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: East of the airport.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt spoons the last of his slurpee. Turns to Macy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How good is your Spanish?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mine is. How did you get all this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt smiles, spooning himself slurpee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Power of persuasion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Know a Wells Fargo on Baseline?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No cabron. We drive to Cave Creek for the bank. There is a Wells Fargo on Baseline, but it is a narco bank. The narcos hit you as you walk to it... Only the Salvadorans use it, cuz they don't know... the soldiers deposit narco money there. They will rob you cabron, to make up for what they skimmed. No, you have to bank up by the white cowboys, that is safest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Looks at Matt) Guillermo told the truth about everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna have a good day.(Points to the migrants) Let's send these guys home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Border patrol's not down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Think they'd tell us all this and then go back to Mexico? You get one night's sleep and forget everything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you ... don't cross again. Not for a long time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The migrant looks down at a small card in his hand. The others have them as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These green cards are good?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better than good, my friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men get up casually and walk out, sipping their soft drinks. Matt looks at Macy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have friends at Phoenix SWAT?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we use them for breeches when HRT is busy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They any good?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... they get a lot of practice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got a new frame of reference for practice now, don't you. Let's give Phoenix SWAT a call, shall we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (To Alejandro) What did you find out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He lays a hand on her shoulder. The intimacy of the gestu surprises her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch a MAN, 20'S, BAGGY JEANS, WHITE T-SHIRT, sitting the curb, fiddling with an IPhone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We taking him when he makes the grab?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When he comes out of the bank. We need the deposit receipt to seize the account. Let him do the assault... we hit him when he comes out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Through the lens we see A WOMAN, 50's, waddling up. The y man approaches her. He's talking to her. She shakes her h He discreetly punches her in the kidney.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reacts, then reaches into her purse. She hands him ca then kneels down and begins writing something on a piece paper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is she doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Endorsing over her paycheck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stands and walks the other way, holding her side. The young man walks in the bank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PULL BACK and reveal, we are:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt, Reggie, Macy, Alejandro, and CORY, 35, SWAT SERGEAN Two other SWAT officers, and a MAN IN A SUIT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can we get in position?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When he walks out of the bank, we pull beside and you take him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The young man walks out of the bank and is moving down th street. We are moving now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Into a radio) Take him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see TWO PHOENIX PD VEHICLES round the corner. The van doors are thrown open and Cory and his guys are on the ru The young man turns but by the time he does, Cory has tac him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man in the suit, Reggie, and Macy get out. Alejandro Matt stay in the van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have any weapons?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's frisking him. Finds a small bag of meth, the cell ph and the bank receipt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's uh... what's his name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hands him the bank receipt and the man disappears inside...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cory continues digging and finds five thousand in cash on young man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Little walking money, sport?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy takes this all in. A crime she didn't even know exis She walks back to the van.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys coming?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt shakes his head `no'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't go in the bank, Kate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is something I can actually build a case on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns and walks in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We hold on a PRINTOUT OF ACCOUNT ACTIVITY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Deposit. Deposit. Deposit. Deposit. Every day. The accoun balance around two million dollars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These are all Manuel Diaz's accounts?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Look here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy and Reggie are leaning over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cash Deposits coming in daily, the balance transferred to a money market account in 9000 dollar increments. All cash transactions 10,000 and over must be reported to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you can seize that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Already have. I'll go through these wire transfer numbers and freeze all these accounts as well... this is a really big bust. I don't know why we've never tried this before. Who knew they just stood outside banks and robbed people, then deposited the money...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy and Reggie ask themselves the same question.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WELLS FARGO MANAGER walks over some more paperwork. The in the suit looks it over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Know what this is?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shows her a printout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a bank line of credit. You make payments over what you owe and it doesn't show as cash it shows as a negative loan balance... See that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He points to the loan amount.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my god.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy walks out of the bank and straight to the van, Reggi right behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks bewildered and scared. She climbs in next to th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They just seized seventeen million dollars... I need that explained to me. Guillermo Diaz told you all that in an HOUR?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We knew where his accounts were, we just didn't know they were shaking people down in front of the fucking branch. It's a bogus bust, though. Can't prosecute it. No one controls who deposits money in an account. An attorney will have that money back in a few months... but a lot of heads will roll before then...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can arrest Manuel for now. At least get him off the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heads off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you dare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She turns back to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need him to get called back to Mexico. That's the objective, Kate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That makes NO sense... We can get him off the street! RIGHT NOW. If I can tie any of these payments to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't arrest him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She marches back toward the bank.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy and Reggie sit across from Jennings and Phil. Bob Fi is there as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: US Attorney won't issue the warrant. I can't override--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is ridiculous. His guys are robbing people IN FRONT OF THE BANK... So we find out where his boss lives in Mexico. Big deal. I've seen the Mexican police in action and believe me --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kate... what do you want? What would you like done here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would like to follow some semblance of procedure, and build a prosecutable case against --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We prosecuted more felony drug cases in this region last year than in the two previous years combined. Are you feeling that on the street? You getting the `vibe' that we"re winning?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... I don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Advisors like Matt come in, stir the pot, cause these criminals to react and make mistakes. That's how we build cases against the individuals that actually make a difference in this fight. When they're nervous, when they stop trusting their crews, when they move their money... these are all opportunities to strike... that's the purpose of contractors like Matt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't something I dreamed up myself, Kate. I don't have the authority to hire advisors or authorize joint agency missions. Or fly agents from air force bases, are you understanding me? These decisions are made far from here. By officials elected to office, not appointed to them... so if your fear is operating out of bounds I am telling you, you're not. The boundary has been moved. Got it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She does. But that doesn't mean she likes it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy and Reggie drive in silence. Nowhere in particular.. Just driving.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd that guy say the safe banks were, Cave Creek?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ever been there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't even know where it is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: North of Scottsdale. Horse country...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Big saloon there called the Buffalo Chip... Feel like a beer somewhere far away?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? There an angle here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Angle is me getting drunk and forgetting about today.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the Buffalo Chip? Yeah... I'll go to the Buffalo Chip. Get my two step on... Drive your drunk ass home later...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For the first time, we see her laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright. To the Chip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They drive North, in search of a moment's escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind   the saloon is a small arena, a   corral to it's In the   corral, a half dozen bulls. In   the arena -- a cowboy   on a bull, hanging on for dear   life. Country m blares   through speakers from the beer   garden just bey

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: About twenty people sit on bleachers watching the bull riders, Macy and Reggie among them, drinking beer from gi cups.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That fool's crazy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These guys are pros, this is where they practice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This what you do? Come here trolling for rednecks...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy laughs. Reggie takes in the crowd -- lots of young blonde girls in hats and jeans two sizes too small.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peckerwoods got some fine-ass women though.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bet I start seeing you here weekly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The next bull erupts from the chute, sending a cowboy ass over elbow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll say this... these folks got it figured. Music's all..(He stamps his foot and claps) bout life just... beating em, but still happy. Can't take that away from em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go inside. I wanna dance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lit's git in thar an' boot scoot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy and Reggie have infiltrated a line dance. Reggie's interpretation is mockery, but his gun is visible, so no one's saying shit...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy laughs, spins. Doesn't know how to line dance... fee good to move anyway. She sways, clicks her heels, and act like a woman, for just a moment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy   and Reggie sit at a long table, many beers in. The easy   together... Would be easy to make a mistake tonigh fuck   up a great partnership, but they've walked this li many   times before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think some of these girl's are getting drunk enough to forget they're racist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh for God's sake, a Black man is president. Racism is dead, and even if it wasn't when he popped Bin Ladin he won over the hold outs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A blonde thing is smiling at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie notices a HANDSOME COWBOY. Tall, broad shoulders..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's Phoenix PD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Spots him) Really... Invite him over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HEY! TED!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted turns to the sound. Seems surprised to see Reggie. Wa over. He carries what looks like a gym bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you got there man?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I rode tonight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bull? No shit?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Were you watching?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For a minute, how'd you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tossed right out of the chute. (Sees Macy) Hi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles a bit. Shy even...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sit down, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me grab you guys some beers, what is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything, man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Married?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All yours. In my basketball league.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good guy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's great. Sergeant in vice. Divorced, couple kids I think...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy watches him as he orders. The girl beside him, much younger and pretty, is chatting him... He's chatting back She retreats into her shell, feeling foolish for thinking would be that easy to meet someone... She clouds. Reggie notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'ma cock block that little blonde for you... gonna be a sacrifice...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... Thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie walks up to Ted and the girl, charms his way betwe and gabs them both. We see Macy, letting herself be hopeful...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie, the blonde, Ted, and Macy all sit together. Ted s beside Macy -- the battle lines are drawn for the night - she is his. He is showing them the cinch that goes around bull's belly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wrap this around and then- (he grabs Macy's arm) I'll demonstrate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wraps the nylon belt around her hand once, twice, thre times...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know where this is going --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't discourage him. Know how long it's been since someone tied me up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted and Macy share a charged look. She smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't give me any ideas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying very hard to give you ideas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tension of it, the flirt of it, she looks ten years younger... Alive. They hold each other's eyes, almost lik dare... He's captivated by her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (softly) I want to take you outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There it is... Macy surrenders with a smile...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stand like school kids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scuse us. We're just gonna...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mmhmm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take a look around back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch my bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch them walk off through the club.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are looking at the sheet metal outer wall of the saloo Macy's head comes hard into frame, Ted's right after. The devour each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tears at the snaps of his shirt, runs her hand along chest, grabbing a handful of chest hair and pulling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He tears frantically at her pants. Gets them unbuttoned a slips his hand inside. Her head flies back in ecstacy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What am I -- Uhh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With one hand she attacks his belt and pulls at the zippe his jeans. She reaches into his jeans. His turn to moan..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie has the cinch and is toying with the blonde girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See you can also... let me show you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She laughs at his attempt to do the wrap Ted did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck it.( He pulls out his handcuffs) We'll just use these.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She loses herself in laughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... (she motions to Ted's bag) Anything else fun in there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shows her Ted's hand cuffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you two plan this??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He laughs, then spots something else. At the bottom of th bag, he sees it --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A computer print out of a photo from the Wells Fargo secu camera... A PHOTO OF MACY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything about Reggie changes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got a cell phone?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call 911. Right fucking now, call 911.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puts his badge on the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell them I said so. Read them the badge number.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Reggie is gone. The girl starts dialing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MACY'S back is against the Sheet metal, Ted pressed again her. Bare legs wrapped around him. He thrusts deep inside her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is rapid, almost angry. She needs this. Release is com she moans freely now, she's so close--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see something moving toward them in a blur.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie's fist slams the side of Ted's face. It knocks him of frame, exposing Macy completely naked below the waist, legs spread wide against the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She panics, reaching down to pull up her pants and falls as Reggie jumps on Ted, beating him senseless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOTHER FUCKER!!! MOTHER FUUUCCCKKKERRRR!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted is helpless, curled into a fetal position, face broke and bleeding.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing???

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sirens can be heard. Reggie has Ted cuffed now and is frisking him. Knife in his boot. Pistol in the other boot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was sent here. There's surveillance photos of you IN HIS BAG!!! He works for the fucking cartel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She leans against the wall, still flushed and breathing heavy, so close to orgasm, now the farthest thing from it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie... pull up my pants for me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FUCK YOU.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got it wrong... nothing was gonna happen... wasn't... Didn't even know she--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie kicks him quiet. Macy starts to do something she hasn't done in a decade. She's fighting it, but sex broug so much emotion with it. And now -- no release. Try thoug she may, she starts to cry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie goes to her and hugs her as CAVE CREEK POLICE VEHI pull into the parking lot, sirens blazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EVERYONE IS HERE NOW. FBI. All of them. Ted is loaded int car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy rests against a SQUAD CAR, smoking a cigarette, too exhausted to care that she looks like she just got fucked outside a bar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Director Jennings walks up, leans against the car beside

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See what I mean? They try to react and make mistakes... you want a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then keep shaking the tree. Let's see what else falls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jennings stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finding that photo and luring him out. That was smart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His knowing smile says: our little secret.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods in appreciation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, Dave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. Unlike most of the perps we see, Phoenix PD officers facing thirty years in prison have plenty to lose. We'll know whatever he knows very soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jennings walks off. Macy pulls a long drag from the cigarette. She looks at it, and must accept the fact that is once again a smoker...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie walks up to her. He hands her a new pack. They loo each other. Try not to, but can't help it. They laugh... when Macy's laughter risks turning to tears, she stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thought all you white girls shaved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She starts laughing again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You saved my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah. Think he was meant to scare you, or test you, maybe...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are they following us?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't know. They're gonna take your vehicle, look for a transmitter. Which would mean there's someone in our house involved too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe someone tailed us from the bank... I don't know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The not knowing scares her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. I mean it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He accepts it with a nod.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is he now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Backseat of your car. With our shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Takes that in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope they kill him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't mean that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They lean against the car in silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted sits in the backseat, face destroyed. The reality of situation now fully in front of him. Matt sits in the fro seat, Alejandro beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Okay. Okay...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said that Ted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look... I. I. I was asked what her

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As quick as a cat, Alejandro stabs his thumb into Ted's e Ted pitches forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The beauty of you being so beat to shit... No one's gonna notice a couple more scratches... this is a new game, Ted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm the guy who will decide if your daughters get Federal protection or whether we post your ex wife's address on the internet. I decide whether you go to prison at a work camp in Missouri or a kill house like Corcoran. This is where you negotiate how to survive...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm in really fucking deep here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many officers do they have on the force?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know... How do I guarantee my family's safe?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want the truth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give the names, give the houses, phone numbers ... Give me all of you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch from a distance as Matt and Alejandro listen. Ma stands and waves over the Director and other agents. They lean over and listen to Ted spilling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ted is then removed and marched toward another vehicle. Alejandro and Matt walk toward Macy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She laughs at the conviction this lie is given by everyon

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love how we're all going to pretend I planned this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You write it that way in the report. (Looking at Reggie) Yes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well ... she found the picture and led him outside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Real quick thinking, Kate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah ... So, can I go home tonight or ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sure ... This is good news. They're going to call Manuel back. Soon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoopee. Then we can call the Mexican police to go arrest their employer. Why do I think that won't happen?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Matt really likes this girl) Gotta have a little faith.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can come stay with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be fine... They have your picture too, you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Thought crossed my mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phil waves Reggie over. Macy is alone. She looks left, an Alejandro is beside her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Dry) I understand now, okay? They're everywhere and I'll never know who to trust, as evidenced by me fucking my hit man behind a bar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He wasn't an assassin. He was just supposed to be your friend and hopefully find out who is showing you how to hurt them. They are looking for us, not you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That doesn't scare you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been doing this for a long time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks out over the cactus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In Mexico, police do not investigate crimes for the government. Attorneys do. That's what I did. I was very close to arresting someone who ... someone I shouldn't have tried to arrest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His mind wanders back. He remembers...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The brilliance of what they do when they mutilate a body is make people think -- Oh, that person must have done something to receive such a death. They must have been involved.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They must have deserved it ... And for the family ... It soils every memory you have of that person. They make it impossible to imagine the face you loved without seeing the initials carved into her forehead. Imagine her body without seeing her chest with -- remember her before...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He draws in a deep breath. Swallows the emotion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her breasts were cut off ... Remember your child without ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks off. Can't even say it ... Won't say it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They kill the body, the memory, everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She shivers as she digests his words. Alejandro looks up the stars. Studies them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You remind me of my wife. I find it very difficult to look at you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He steps away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get some rest tonight. Tomorrow they will call Manuel back, and we will cut a leg from them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks back toward Matt, leaving Macy staring out acros the desert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silvio sleeps. A shadow crosses his face. He opens an eye Eliseo stands there holding coffee and a plate of eggs an tortillas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Juevos?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Si papa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Con jalapenos?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Si.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silvio sits up. Takes the coffee, drinks. No booze in it. Thinks about sending it back, but the look on Eliseo's fa makes him reconsider. He'll get drunk soon enough. He tak the plate and feeds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eliseo sits on the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Trabajando hoy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: En la noche.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quere jugar baseball? En el parque?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man chews. Thinks. Exaggerates his expressions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmmmm ... baseball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boy laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BASEBALL!!! Si.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The boy shoots off like a rocket. Silvio laughs. As he ea we see the AK 47 by the bed. A bag of coke and a thousand so dollars on the night stand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy and Reggie pull in and park next to five US GOVERNME SUBURBANS. They get out and walk past them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They get to the room and knock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt lets them in. He wears desert camo fatigues, as do m of the people in the room. There are computers linked to monitors. One displays footage of MANUEL DIAZ'S HOUSE and OFFICE. Another is footage of the DESERT. But that footag MOVING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We may have the tunnel, right here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We look at the footage. Cactus and desert grass in the foreground. In the background, a ravine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll know soon enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We look at cactus and brush along a ridge. Slowly, caterpillar slow, the brush begins moving. We can just ma out an enormous telephoto lens wrapped in camouflage tape

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt points to coolers filled with Gatorade and Red Bull.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tasty beverage?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This guy ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's the plan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Easy smile) Going hunting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a DOD AGENT wearing headphones and sitting in fr of what looks like a sound board linked to a computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the other room, DELTA and one of his team members wa through. Moving toward the TOPO MAP on the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright. Listen up. We're waiting for visual confirmation to move, so let's clarify the op. We will drive to this location. Proceed on foot to this ridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He moves to a diagram of a tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This diagram is based on other tunnels that have been mapped. This is NOT accurate, it is for reference only. We expect a small exit corridor on our side of the border. They mark the international border in the tunnel with red paint so Border Patrol doesn't pursue past that point. Once on the Mexican side, there will be a small staging area, then another shaft will lead to the main warehouse and the road that returns to Mexico. Once we clear the mules, we don't expect more than a dozen bandits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DELTA looks at Matt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wanna discuss ROE?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll save that for later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is an in and out. We are clearing and placing an agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once we've cleared the tunnel and dropped the agent, DEA will take over the scene. Alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An operator watching a monitor speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This looks like confirmation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We look at the monitor and see a large amount of brush, a behind it, an old wrecked car entangled in it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That looks like it. Okay, let's gear up. Got a good drive ahead of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They begin breaking down gear, pulling maps from the wall Matt turns to an agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First thing, get that surveillance van operational.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to fit your guy with a locator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The agent takes off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy and Reggie's heads are spinning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those guys are Special Ops. (To Matt) Are we going on this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt turns to them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You aren't really dressed for it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you didn't fucking tell us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You went crying to daddy yesterday. We don't want daddy to know everything. Loose lips sink ships, haven't you learned that yet? Don't worry, we got extra--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have tac gear in our car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro steps into the room. Dressed in head to toe bla Face painted as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She notices Alejandro's gear. Ear piece. Silenced HK Mark tactical vest. Night vision goggles. No one else is dress like him. The operator straps what looks to be a wrist wa on Alejandro's arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck is he dressed for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relax. You guys will hang back when we get there, k?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why are we going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because CIA can't operate within US borders without a domestic agency attached. Right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At last. She gets it. He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. All the drugs we find, you guys get to confiscate. Gonna be a big day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why we're here. That's the only reason.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five suburbans and a large cargo van drive down the desol highway as the sun begins to set.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silvio sits in his little courtyard, watching the chicken He tosses a handful of feed and they scamper after it. He drinks a beer. Three empties beside him. He looks at his watch. It's time. He gets up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three state Police Vehicles. One being loaded full of bri of marijuana. Silvio stands beside the car, smoking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt sits in the front seat. A Delta operator driving. Ma Reggie, Alejandro and three Delta operators sit in the ba

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt is on his cell.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What. What. What's he saying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Um. Hold on... They called him back. He's on the road now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turning left on Scottsdale. You got about three hours and he'll be across.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt turns back to the Delta operators.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna have to hit the tunnel the minute we get on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt looks at Macy and Reggie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pretty exciting, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They don't share his enthusiasm. They just want this to b over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manuel is sweating, even though the AC blasts in his face the seat beside him is an overnight bag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch Manuel's Range Rover get on the interstate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's on I 10, travelling southeast...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MEXICAN STATE POLICE VEHICLE ambleS down the road, head toward the tunnel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silvio drives, marijuana bundles fill the backseat. He sm a cigarette, he slows down, pulls off the pavement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch from a distance as Silvio's vehicle bounces down dirt road, disappearing into the desert as the sun hides behind the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pull off the highway and stop. A man in a ghillie suit stands up, walks toward them carrying a camera with an 80 lens. Matt turns toward us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On foot from here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy steps out and sees another vehicle parked. Another h dozen men in full camo. From the back of the Suburban, si duffel bags are opened. Operators reach in and grab weapo magazines, grenades. Generation 4 night vision goggles ar passed to everyone. DELTA walks up to Reggie and Macy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep your fucking safeties on and the barrels pointed down. Stay in the back and don't shoot anyone on my fucking team, got it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Doesn't wait for a reply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We HAVE done this before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think we've done THIS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They move out. We watch the world through NIGHT VISION GOGGLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We run a bit then kneel down. We are flagged forward. Kne down. We leap frog this way forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy looks out over the desert. TWO COYOTES(the animals), stopped, staring right at us. Macy makes eye contact. The begin trotting off, never breaking eye contact with Macy, though they are begging her to follow. While she still ca

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We come to a rise. Everyone lays down. DELTA whispers to Alejandro.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rules of engagement on this deal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't use those. Ask Matt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DELTA turns the other way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rules of engagement?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weapons free, my friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He whispers it down the line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie's eyes scream `what the fuck'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We drop into a ravine and follow it. Up ahead we see the brush and the old car that is hood first in the ground, l it was dropped from the sky. The team lines up across fro it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Into mouthpiece) Where is the target?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bout twenty minutes to the border.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (To Delta)We need to boogie. And we need to do it quiet till we find the center.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delta pulls his knife. Alejandro comes up to the front.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro nods. He and the Delta operators move ahead, silently. Disappear behind the old car. After a moment we follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We enter the tunnel. Moving fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We pass the body of a SMUGGLER, throat slit. We continue. shaft banks left, we follow...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another body lies on the ground, throat slit, though eyes wide open, bleeding out and staring up at us as we pass.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We see the operators ahead. DELTA backtracks to Matt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispers) So we're clear, I don't need to announce. Weapons free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They don't get freer buddy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The operator moves forward, whispers to his group. They a pull out their 1911 pistols and attach silencers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take the left shaft ... Make noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DELTA returns his pistol to it's holster, raises his rifl His men follow suit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't want us with you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Draw them to you. The one I am looking for will try and run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The operators move into the left chamber, Alejandro moves to the right. Matt holds Macy and Reggie up. Points to th ceiling: RED PAINT ALL THE WAY AROUND.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cross this and it's new rules.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She takes the dare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fair enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt moves down the left shaft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fuck are we doing in here? Let's go back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Machine gun fire erupts. The fight has begun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're in fucking Mexico!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THEN GO BACK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll never leave her. As he moves up the tunnel, Macy lo right, toward the shaft Alejandro took. Can't resist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: REGGIE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's too far ahead to hear. She heads down Alejandro's pa anyway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We find SILVIO, and he is panicking, throwing the marijua from his car to the ground. Another man runs up and helps

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAPIDO RAPIDO!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hear more gunfire. Screw it. Silvio's not waiting ar any longer. He gets in the driver's seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Traiga me contigo!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No cabron!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The man opens the passenger door as Silvio starts the squ car. A bullet penetrates the bandit's face, just under th eye. He drops as if he's been unplugged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silvio ducks down, throwing the car in reverse, but a han reaches in the window, and turns the car off. Silvio look and sees --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HE pulls Silvio from the car. Spins him around. Pulls the pistol from Silvio's belt. Tosses it on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silvio stares at Alejandro in absolute terror.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: El Medellin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro places his pistol to Silvio's face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No me mata!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro jams his thumb in Silvio's larynx. Silvio gasps air. Alejandro grabs his hair, pistol to his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What you do now is for your family. Whether they see tomorrow rests with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tears roll down Silvio's cheek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will drive me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHAT ARE YOU DOING??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro turns and sees Macy, her rifle trained on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put that down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STEP AWAY. I mean it. Move away from him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The automatic fire from different tunnel shafts rushes in out like blasts of hot air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are in Mexico now. You have no jurisdiction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't be here--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro raises his pistol and fires six rounds into Mac chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She collapses to the ground, sucking for air. Alejandro w over and grabs her rifle. Tosses it in the back of the Po car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't ever point a weapon at me again. Get your breath and go back to the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She gasps, clasping at the Kevlar vest that saved her lif She rolls onto her stomach and struggles to stand. Reache for her pistol. Alejandro slams her face into his knee. Tosses her pistol across the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it Kate. Just stop. This is what we were sent here to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls her to her feet. Points his pistol at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have time. Go to the surface. Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blood pours from her shattered nose. She has lost and she knows it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You lured Manuel to Mexico so you could kill him. This is your cab driver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am here to kill the man with the power to summon Manuel Diaz. I am here for Fausto. But I will kill Manuel too. It's what I do, Kate. Go. Or I will do it to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stumbles back, turns around and runs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Turning the gun on Sylvio) Get in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro gets in the back seat of the police car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drive back to Mexico.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car backs up, spins and drives the tunnel road until ARE:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are in the backseat, looking through the windshield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Into mouthpiece) I am through, do you have my location?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Copy. We have you. Target is east and north of you. Looks like highway 56 to 17 will intercept him if he stays on 17. Will advise. Go east on 56 off highway 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Este a calle cinquinta y seis.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have a son... I... have a son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Having family... does that save the lives of the men you are hired to kill? Hmm?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sylvio stares in the rearview mirror at the phantom ducke low behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie looks around, doesn't see Macy anywhere. Spots Mat among the Delta team.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Into mouthpiece) Is he through?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Copy. GPS is transmitting. Audio is transmitting. Should intercept in 20.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt pats DELTA on the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was a clean, clean fucking op my friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delta points back toward the approaching Reggie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Except for these assholes. Like it better overseas where we don't have baby sitters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie reaches them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see Kate?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's not with you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta go back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Matt sighs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, let's go.(Yells to the team) We're missing one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Delta rolls his eyes. They approach the tunnel entrance w Macy walks out. She spots Matt and punches him for all sh worth. He deflects it, sweeps her leg and she hits the ground. Hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie rushes him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey man, what the --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is grabbed and flung to the ground by DELTA. He holds Reggie's face to the ground with his boot. Rifle pointed him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just lay back, baby. Let it happen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reggie struggles for even a breath much less a response. grabs Macy and pulls her back into the tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's an assassin. A government

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our government doesn't have assassins. We farm that out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is Medellin?? What is that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Refers to a time when one group controlled every aspect of the drug trade. Providing a measure of order. That we can control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And until someone figures out how to convince 20 percent of the US population to stop smoking and snorting this shit, order is the best we can hope for... Alejandro is working to return that order.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He works for the cartels in Colombia... He works for the fucking competition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He works for whoever points him toward the people that made him, Kate. Us, them, anyone that will turn him loose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stands close to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get away from me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take a breath and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pushes him hard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fucking kill me or get out of my way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at her. Takes a step back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Long walk back to Phoenix.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll manage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She walks out of the tunnel toward Reggie. DELTA removes boot and walks away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Helicopters can be heard. In the distance, sirens are approaching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy and Reggie walk away from the scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What just happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They woke me up. Showed me the whole thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I quit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They continue to walk, sirens racing toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Far ahead, we see TAIL LIGHTS. Silvio's labored breathing gives rhythm to the racing vehicle. Alejandro stays low i the back seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Into mouthpiece) This is the target ahead? Confirm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Copy. Black Range Rover, 60 meters ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put on your lights. Pull the car over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He flips on his siren.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sees the siren.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the fuck. Want to bribe me, eh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reaches for his pistol, puts it in his lap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The range Rover pulls over. Us right behind it. Silvio is breathing even heavier, if that's possible. So many ways can go wrong...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use the speaker. Tell him to get out of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silvio grabs the radio handset, flips the switch, and his voice comes through the speaker on the roof of the car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Afuera del carro!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This mother fucker...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sticks the pistol in his waistband. Opens the car door Steps out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We watch Manuel through the windshield. He is standing in road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell him to raise his shirt and turn around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Levanta su camisa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know who I am? HUH??

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell him to do it or you will shoot him where he stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Voy a matarse cabron. Levanta tu camisa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manuel does it. We see the pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tira la pistola en la tierra.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manuel throws his pistol in the dirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look how good you are at pretending to be a police officer. Out of the car. Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Headlights blind Manuel, but he can see the car door has opened, and an image is moving toward him. He waits, for fool who is robbing the wrong mother fucker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the image reaches Manuel, something moves from behind Fast. An arm reaches around Manuel and two shots are fire from a silenced pistol. Now the pistol is held to the bac Manuel's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Walk back to your car.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who was he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A mule. Like you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro fires a round into Manuel's calf. He wails in p He fires another round into his right hand as it hits the asphalt. He screams louder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the leg so you don't run. In the hand so you don't try to fight and make me have to kill you yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know... who .. The.. I AM A JEFE!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know who you are, Manuel. You are no jefe, but you will drive me to one...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro kneels down, and for the first time, Manuel can his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you try anything, if you betray me, your daughters will burp the semen of twenty men with their last breath. Do you understand me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manuel's eyes go wide. He nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro opens the back door before letting Manuel get i the front. In an instant, Manuel is in the driver's seat Alejandro seated behind. The doors are closed and the Ran Rover disappears down the road. We are left with Silvio, gasping, struggling, like a fish tossed thoughtlessly on beach, as he flops helplessly on the empty road.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We near an isolated estate. We turn off the main road to private road that leads a mile or so onto Fausto's hacien

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the large house comes into view. VEHICLES can be seen parked in front. We approach a car along the road, a man sitting on the hood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manuel rolls his window down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soy Manuel Diaz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Si, te conosco. El Jefe esta esperando.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rear window rolls down. A pistol comes out. A silence round is fired into the face of the man. He falls back on hood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happens when we get to the house?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You get out and walk toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What will happen to me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What you do now is for your family. There is no you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think you are so different?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Not anymore. Now I am the same. Turn the car a bit more to the left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The car stops. THREE MEN stand in the driveway with autom rifles. The Range Rover is parked so the right headlight pointed directly toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manuel opens the door and we are--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manuel walks toward the men -- looking for a way out of t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Senor, buenos noches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro takes his pistol and presses the silenced barre the top of manuel's head, pulling the trigger and driving Manuel into the ground like a nail. As Manuel's body drop Alejandro fires on all three men -- hitting them all in t head, killing them instantly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He walks to the front door, opens it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A man rounds the corner into the main foyer and without slowing down, Alejandro touches the barrel to his forehea and fires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can hear the sound of talking in another room. Alejand moves to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAUSTO, 50's, graying hair. Big belly. Sits at the head o the table. JACINTA, 30's trophy wife, sits beside him gul wine. They have three CHILDREN, two girls and a boy. A wo in her 60's cooks in the kitchen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RAPIDO, MAMA!, tengo hambre!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro walks into the room, presses his foot against Jacinta's side, and launches her out of frame, then sits to Fausto, presses the gun to his shoulder and fires. The children scream. Mama turns, Alejandro points the gun at

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SIENTATE! AQUI!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She comes around and sits as ordered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jacinta stands up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll kill you. Stay still.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your children speak English?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then we will spare them. I interrupted dinner. Please... Continue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fausto stares at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every night, you have families killed, and yet you dine. Tonight should be no different.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Points the pistol at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He slowly fills a fork, puts it in his mouth. Tells his children to do the same. They chew their meal and cry. Alejandro turns to the old woman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take the children away from here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She rises and hurries the children out of the dining area

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Points the gun at Jacinta) You. Whore. Sit over there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She sits. Alejandro turns to Fausto, notices he has stopp eating. Picks up a fork and stabs it into Fausto's hand. Fausto screams.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not finished. Eat...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fausto forces down another bite, rests his trembling hand the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will give you a choice, Fausto, one I was not given... You may choose to die tonight or live with the shame of having the mother of your children take your place...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at Fausto. Fausto stops chewing. Processes what just said.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes ... Choose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fausto looks at Jacinta. Her eyes say, "Goodbye my brave love"... Never dawns on her what he's thinking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I take shame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's stunned. Tears run her heavy make up. She looks to Alejandro. No mercy there. Back to her husband.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love me more. I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He isn't. It wasn't a hard decision. She turns to Alejand Holds her chin high in defiance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it. You fuck. Chinga tu madre PUNTA CABRON ANDALE PUES!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro looks at Fausto.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See why you married her. Spunk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro looks into Fausto's uncaring eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro fires into Fausto's belly. Touches the barrel t his arm, fires again. Fausto screams. Alejandro presses t barrel to Fausto's throat, fires again. Fausto falls to t floor, gargling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch death come for you. Watch. The devil is near, Fausto. He is waiting for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fausto's terrified eyes stare back at Alejandro as he gas for air. Drowning in his own blood. There is no specific moment when death comes. He simply fades. Alejandro sits down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is what they think of you. You see?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stares at him, shaking so profusely you might think s is freezing to death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe you have enough pride that you don't marry another one of these. Maybe you take his money and go hide and raise your children far from here. Maybe your son grows up to be a doctor. And I don't have to come back and kill him some day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro walks out, leaving Jacinta shivering alone at t dinner table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A shadow falls over an empty bed. Eliseo stands there... has never happened before. He walks down the hall to the kitchen. His mother is in the same place, cooking. But th look in her eyes is anger. She knows he is dead. And may damn him for making her be the one to tell their son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stands there. Staring at his mother.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mama?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dressed in jeans and a t-shirt, she sits on the balcony, takes a drag of her cigarette. Looks at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three days ago I hadn't had you in ten years... fucker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She leans back and looks out over Phoenix as the sun sets She exhales ... looks at the cigarette.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Half joking) You're the only one who understands me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think maybe, it will be the thing that kills us all ... as a people, you know?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Macy leaps up as if she's on fire, falls over her chair, comes up with her pistol. He moves so fast there is no ti to react.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In an instant, he has the gun and removes the magazine, disassembles the slide, and tosses the pieces on the tabl She screams and rushes him. He spins her and pushes her b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He moves to her and gently touches her face, looking at t gash on her nose. She is frozen in fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That will scar. I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She breathes heavy, trying to remain calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He begins lifting her shirt. She struggles and he grabs h throat. She looks into his eyes and it is a killer lookin back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let me look ... Move your hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She surrenders, turns her head to the side. He lifts her shirt above her bare breasts. Six large, red welts...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These ribs are bruised, but not broken, yes?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods as her lip quivers. Clinging desperately to her dignity. She has never felt so powerless, and that is his point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drops her shirt and steps back. She crosses her arms, feeling very weak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alejandro sits across from her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would recommend not standing on balconies for a little while.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She doesn't move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're an assassin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In Mexico, the killers are called Sicarios... The word comes from the zealots of Jerusalem. Killers who hunted the Romans that invaded their homeland... They don't deserve the term.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are a Sicario.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Policing them does nothing. They must be killed. Wherever they are found. They will make every place they touch Juarez. Now ... Now you understand how far we have fallen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He studies her-- arms crossed, legs close together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You look like a girl when you're scared. Such beauty in you when you let yourself be frail. Like the daughter they took from me ... This is not the work for you. Look at yourself, Kate. What it has done to you in just three days ... Find a little town far from the border. A place where the rule of law still exists. You will spot predators there very easy now... Make a difference you can see everyday. Because you will not survive here. You are not a wolf. This is the land of wolves now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks at her. Smiles sadly and leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She waits. Starts to cry, fights it back. Begins frantica reassembling the pistol. Rams the magazine in and racks a round. Comes around the corner. Enters the house. Looks around. Checks every room, panting, shaking. He is gone. stands there and sobs...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mother walks with Eliseo, dressed for soccer. Down th empty street. Sirens in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We like to think if we cut the head from the snake, the serpent will die...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They round the corner. We follow them to a park. Weeds cu short to look like grass. Little boys dressed in uniforms parents sitting in lawn chairs. A referee. Just people, desperately trying to enjoy the life they have been given

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But there is no snake. They are worms. When you cut the head, a new one grows. From both segments ... We cannot question if the end justifies the means because there is no end to consider...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eliseo runs to join his team. Whatever his mother told hi it wasn't the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the price of our self indulgence. Our weakness ... Our appetite. They are our demons, our creation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The mother sits on the ground, watching the boys. Running Playing. Being children. The referee blows a whistle. The boys assume their positions on the field. The forwards li up, facing each other. Eliseo is dead center, the team's star. The referee sets the ball in place...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone stops and stares in the direction of the gunfire is very still. People frozen like deer in a field -- weig the risk. No more shooting. The morning is quiet again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a moment in each person's life. A choice. Do what feels good... Do what is good. Make the wrong choice enough, and it is not presented again... then all choices are bad. And the consequences worse. There is no war on drugs. Only war. The enemy we fight? Ourselves ...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The referee blows the whistle and sets the ball down. The game begins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eliseo swipes it and kicks it out of frame, the other boy chasing him...
